theDuelist:MillenniumPuzzle.NAME: Millennium Puzzle
theDuelist:MillenniumPuzzle.FLAVOR: The Millennium Puzzle is one of the Millennium Items. It was originally known as the Millennium Pendant, but after being shattered and requiring assembly it came to be known as the Millennium Puzzle.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #ySummon #b1.

theDuelist:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain +1 Strength.
